issue.title: [CF 1605] Is it possible to track snapshotting for Feral?
issue.body:
If so, how?  The icon would have to show if any particular spell consumed a stack of Bloodtalons or if a spell's (or debuff's) damage has been increased by particular buffs like Tiger's Fury...


> Posted by CurseForge user daemon9 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1605 | Raw

comments.body:
No, this isn't supported. Sorry.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
